name: XMLExportMaps
shortdesc: A collection of XML export maps.

parameters.name: mappedStyle
parameters.shortdesc: The mapped style. Can accept: ParagraphStyle, CharacterStyle, TableStyle, CellStyle or String.

parameters.name: markupTag
parameters.shortdesc: The tag to map. Can accept: XMLTag or String.

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new XMLExportMap (Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the XMLExportMap.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLExportMap with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLExportMaps within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The XMLExportMap, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: XMLExportMap, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The XMLExportMap, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: XMLExportMap, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first XMLExportMap in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last XMLExportMap in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle XMLExportMap in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLExportMap with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the XMLExportMap that follows the desired XMLExportMap.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLExportMap whose index follows the specified XMLExportMap in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The XMLExportMap whose index comes before the desired XMLExportMap.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any XMLExportMap in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every XMLExportMap in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the XMLExportMap.
Returns the XMLExportMap with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
